reviews.sentence: Nice location old fashioned. We slept one night in this hotel for business. Perfectly located the hotel offers god services. Very good restaurants and an Amazing pool. The room was very old fashioned and noisy I asked for a quiter one and I get a noisier. I guess there are no quiet rooms. In the center of Santo Domingo is probably one of the best choices but we are far away from the standard that this Amazing location would deserve.

Resort in Santo Domingo near colonial city. this hotel is a gem. Hotel staff was very friendly and helpful. Our original assigned room had a broken toilet and no view. The staff gave us drinks at the bar while they got us a newly renovated room with a pool side view. We were hoping to stay in the colonial city to be walking distance to all historic buildings and museums but this turned out to be a fantastic choice. The breakfast buffet was outstanding with a cook to make you pancakes or scrambled eggs revoluetos. A knowledge of Spanish is helpful. The pool is fantastic. We had not brought swimsuits but went to a nearby mall and purchased them. It was a great place to relax and the water was the perfect temperature. This is primarily a business hotel so the amenities are not crowded during the day. You can walk to a beautiful park and ther is a variety of restaurants right out the front door. Our initial disappointment was soon forgotten.

Business trip. In general I enjoyed staying at this hotel. It is a nice clean place. My only issues were a lack of coffee available in the room. It was not even on the room service menu unles I ordered a whole meal. Also I was not warned about the water and had forgotten about it when brushing my teeth. Bottled water was not available the 2nd day. And the elevators required a key for all floors despite the signs in the elevator indicating it was only needed for certain floors. Other than that I had no issues and would recommend this place.

Details details. Nice but very old and outdated hotel. Renovation should include more than just some furniture changes. Staff is friendly in general but not at the reception desk if they need to do more than just give you your room cards. Incapable to solve the slightest problem disappointing. The hotel was great at some time in the far past. Rooms vary from good to terrible. Electronics are all in disarray. Phone at room failed to work after first day. Cold water in the shower air conditioner just barely keeping up with the hot weather. Snacks at the executive room are to be thrown away. Better not to bother. Location and a fantastic pool. Great location near great restaurants and shopping malls. Renovation of rooms furniture all electronics telephones tvs. Their magnetic door cards are a joke. Fail working after just one use.

Good hotel with rude staff. Hotel looks very pleasant. There is a guy playing piano does look very romantic. But when we went to check in hotel staff was so rude the guy acted like he is somehow better then us. Did not like his attitude at all. When we entered the room which looks good I must admit they did not have a dressing gowns there so we called a reception to ask for one. Hotel staff did not understand what we were asking for. They had to send someone to our room so I showed them a picture for what we were asking for. anyway another hour later we managed to get one. I must say hotel looks very good but I would not stay there again. do not like to be treated this way.

Lareg elegant and busy. Many events hectic and ideal for celebration. Beautiful grounds. Sometimes crazy access due to intense traffic jams. Rooms are nice bathrooms needs attention and restaurant needs more choices. Very central.

Two adults two children on king bed. Off to a very disappointing start in our first Barcelo experience. We are currently mid stay at a Catalonia hotel in La Romana but drove to Santo Domingo for a friends wedding tonight. Check in went smoothly but we were disappointed to open the door to our Executive Club room and find a king bed. We had taken the precaution of calling ahead to be certain we had have two doubles because there was no way to indicate when booking online we were assured that with four people sharing the room they would accommodate us with two beds. Calls and face to face conversations with management have stalemated at they will put a portable twin in the room. At first the front desk insisted that our reservation was only for two adults until I showed them a printout of our reservation. Now they claim there are no other rooms available but if we want we can have some coffee. I hope this story has a happy ending. if so I will update this review. On a positive note our bellman Francisco has been most excellent in his attention and empathy.

Old hotel. Old hotel with old rooms. Poor bathroom and toilet facilities. The pool and outside area is cosy. The food is average. Breakfast is ok. Internet is ok and free. The service is low to medium and too often they assign to wrong ocopued rooms. Located is borrow.

Worst hotel experience I have ever had. I was staying at the hotel for a wedding and the convenience of it being at the venue. I traveled from the US. Friday the plumbing went down in the whole hotel. Saturday early morning the toilet starting making noise before it overflowed into the room. Maintenance quickly came and we were reassigned a room but they only felt 34 dollars was an appropriate compensation for the inconvenience. Even though the rooms were on average 200 dollars. No follow up was done by management to check on our new rooms or apologize for the inconvenience. Rooms are average you could clearly see stains on the carpets in the hallways clearly in need of updating. Lobby is presented well and so are its gardens. I would not stay here again when I visit Santo Domingo again but a newer hotel.

One of the Better Hotels. Stayed 5 days for business. Hotel room was preboked so very affordable. Restaurant was very pricey so we went out for dinners mostly. Rooms were clean bathroom needed some updating but clean. Lobby was lovely. Overall good experience. Pool was good pretty views. Last morning woke up to NO WATER. So no shower nada would have rated it higher but No Water at 530am kinda took that extra star away. But still I would go back there. Hotel was better than most I have visited in Santo Domingo.
Best Hotel in Santo Domingo. Definite the best Hotel right now in Santo Domingo. Fantastic parc and pool area. Nice rooms with a fantastic view.

Remodeling. I satayed in this hotel last week and thay are remodeling the whole place and had my thought about the noice and what a surprice the new room in the 5th flor that are alredy remodel are wonderful they now have a bath tub and the room is huge like a suite the decorator did a great job here lots of new details in the room starting with a 50 TV new carpets and No noice at all this aded to the charming people that work in that hotel and i am glad for them since i have being their client for the past 12 years.

Amazing Historic Hotel. This Beautiful and Historic Hotel is Amazing all Rooms are brand new it surprises me. I want to come back and stay one more time in the near future. Has WiFi in every area complementary Parking and a very secured electronic access to all Floors and Rooms.

Just the Rooms. Supposedly this is a metro luxury hotel represented by the price. The rooms are phenomenal with beautiful modern design. Impressive. Unfortunately that is it. Room service quality and options horrible. Restaurant quality horrible. Customer Service horrible. Stay in your room and go somewhere else for everything else.

4 plus review of Embajador. I have enjoyed the stay my past 2 times at the embajador mainly because I love the newly renovated rooms. Very spacious and clean with hot water bathtub and all. I love it. The new casino is very clean and neat but it is too small for my liking 6 tables at the most and a few slot machines. The hotel is very well located close to everything and a few nice restaurants within walking distance. If there is anything I disliked is the fodQuatro Formagi pizza was simply horrible looked like an amateur home pizza and tasted as suchand not even well baked. Presidente beer was not very cold as they are usually in the DR and even the flan for dessert was ordinary at best. However the service was really good. All in all I have adopted the Embajador as my go to stay in Santo Domingoand the price on weekends are super affordable.

Clean comfortable modern. Great stay very quiet great location close to turistic spots but not in the commotion of things very nice rooms. Only thing is make sure if you book it with breakfast included that it does appear in your confirmation document.

Great hotel. i came back to this hotel after more than 20 years. it is now a modern one with very good rooms but still with a great service and atmosphere. the staff is friendly the bar well equipped and the breakfast excellent.

Very Nice Experience Embajador Hotel. Wonderful people rooms and breakfast for business travellers in Santo Domingo. Very convenience for people love running and to be quiet and rest in a comfortable bedrooms. A huge positive change rooms layout since my last visit.

Wonderful Wedding anniversary. My wife and I had a wonderful time at El embajador. I wanted to celebrate our anniversary at the hotel. Prior to the my stay I email the hotel and received a prompt email back from Ms Patricia Santana. She made all my dreams aka requests come true. I had an early check in flowers chocolate a ready to go bathtub fully decorated with rose petals. It was a very nice surprise for my wife. Also the receptionist Tania Hernandez did a wonderful job making sure that all my requests were done prior to entering the room. Besides that the service was fantastic. I remember Ms Maria de los Santos was very friendly and effective bringing all the snacks I wanted. I highly recommend this hotel. it is beautiful and the service is 5 stars.

amazing property bilingual staff and very attentive to guests needs the rooms are very clean also the outside garden and the 5th and 8th floors are good for smokers and do not let me forget the view of Santo Domingo and the ocean from the 8th floor is amazing.
